channel.title: Suggestion
channel.description:
Removing the Game Development part of the site (since it is rarely used by anyone due to it being distant from the site) and making another subforum to the General Programming section called Game Development. It would get much more use.
Supporters: [ul][*]Chassy13 [*]Loveandpower [*]Ruby [*]Kidpaparoach [*]runescape sucks [*]Soulcist [*]ranger squad[/ul]

item.title: Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

I agree with this. I check out and see the projects every once in awhile, but there aren’t many there. I feel like there would be more of a push in development if this was done.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:12, topic:458581”]I’m not removing it. It may not be active now, but I haven’t even begun to fuel it. My focus right now is MoparScape. Once I’m satisfied with this site, then I’ll be turning my attention to MGD. This thread will do nothing to convince me, either. Sorry.[/quote]I’m still waiting for that summer contest that never came. Lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

Can someone at least clean up the crap over there then (example: http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,524064.msg4096588.html#msg4096588)

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

No, I am under the impression that it is pointless and would be used more as a subforum.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:15, topic:458581”][quote author=Rix_ link=topic=561493.msg4098733#msg4098733 date=1347186151]

There’s no incentive to join it. There’s nothing on there that I couldn’t learn quicker, easier and to a higher level if I googled it.

And there is no reason to delete it either. However I must say creating a whole forum for game dev was uncalled for.
[/quote]
It should be deleted because as a board here it’d get more traffic and be more useful. The “IRL Pictures of You” thread has more posts than game dev…lets make a new board![/quote]

You seem to be under an impression that the current state of MGD is the envisioned wrong. That is where you are mistaken.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“Rix_, post:14, topic:458581”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=561493.msg4098706#msg4098706 date=1347180215]
There’s no incentive to join it. There’s nothing on there that I couldn’t learn quicker, easier and to a higher level if I googled it.
[/quote]
And there is no reason to delete it either. However I must say creating a whole forum for game dev was uncalled for.[/quote]
It should be deleted because as a board here it’d get more traffic and be more useful. The “IRL Pictures of You” thread has more posts than game dev…lets make a new board!

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion

There’s no incentive to join it. There’s nothing on there that I couldn’t learn quicker, easier and to a higher level if I googled it.

And there is no reason to delete it either. However I must say creating a whole forum for game dev was uncalled for.

item.title: Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Taharok:

I’m not removing it. It may not be active now, but I haven’t even begun to fuel it. My focus right now is MoparScape. Once I’m satisfied with this site, then I’ll be turning my attention to MGD. This thread will do nothing to convince me, either. Sorry.

There’s no incentive to join it. There’s nothing on there that I couldn’t learn quicker, easier and to a higher level if I googled it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

rip4d:

I thought that’s how it originally was until it grew enough to get its own board.

I don’t believe so. The idea for the board was suggested, and then it was expanded to an entirely new forum.

I agree with keeping it a section. That forum doesn’t get much traffic.
